an10.185:1.1: “I will teach you the mortifying principle and the unmortifying. …
an10.185:1.3: And what is the mortifying principle?
an10.185:1.6: This is called the mortifying principle.
an10.185:2.1: And what is the unmortifying principle?
an10.185:2.4: This is called the unmortifying principle.”
